abstract: In taking its offer directly to Genzyme stockholders, Sanofi held to the $69-a-share price it has floated for months.
snippet: In taking its offer directly to Genzyme stockholders, Sanofi held to the $69-a-share price it has floated for months.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis of France took its $18.5 billion takeover bid for Genzyme hostile on Monday, going directly to Genzyme’s shareholders in an effort to advance deal negotiations.

headline.main: Sanofi Bid for Genzyme Turns Hostile, and No Sweeter
headline.print_headline: Sanofi Bid for Genzyme Turns Hostile, and No Sweeter

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Thomas Kaplan
